com.oym.indoor

Class Beacon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oym.indoor.Beacon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Beacon>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asset, ProxiBeacon

    public class Beacon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Beacon>
    This class includes all the information regarding the Beacon Items stored.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Beacon.BeaconStatus
      Annotation defining the possible beacon status

    • Constructor Detail

      • Beacon

        public Beacon(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
              int rssi,
              byte[] scanRecord,
              Building building,
              Floor floor)
        Beacon constructor.
        Parameters:
        device - BluetoothDevice object that identifies the remote device
        rssi - The RSSI value for the remote device as reported by the Bluetooth hardware
        scanRecord - The content of the advertisement record offered by the remote device
        building - Building object
        floor - Floor number

      • Beacon

        rssi - The RSSI value for the remote device as reported by the Bluetooth hardware

    • Method Detail

      • detect

        public static boolean detect(byte[] scanRecord)
        This method checks that the BLE broadcasted message corresponds to an Beacon or Eddystone Beacon.
        Parameters:
        scanRecord - The content of the advertisement record offered by the remote device
        Returns:
        true if is an Beacon or Eddystone beacon, false otherwise

      • bytesToHex

        public static java.lang.String bytesToHex(byte[] bytes,
                                          int start,
                                          int end)
        This method converts an array of bytes to an hexadecimal string.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Byte array to be decoded
        start - Initial position to be decoded
        end - Last position to be decoded
        Returns:
        The hexadecimal string representation of the selected bytes, 0 if error

      • computeAccuracy

        public double computeAccuracy(double rssi)
        This method computes an estimation of the accuracy according to the RSSI level received.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
